checkAgainIfServerStarted: Check again if the server has started
noResponse: The server did not respond within a reasonable time.
errRemoteServerNotReachable: Check your settings and ensure that Memos is reachable at the provided URL.
viewCenteredDescription: Starts the app centered on the screen. Disable to restore the window to the exact position where you left it.
viewFullscreenDescription: Starts the app in fullscreen. WARNING: You'll need to use CTRL+F4/Cmd+W to close the window.
viewResizableDescription: Allows the window to be resized.
advancedRemoteServerDescription: Use a remote Memos server instead of the bundled one.
advancedRemoteServerURLDescription: Insert a full url starting with https:// or http://.
advancedUserAgentDescription: Browser user agent string for the WebView. May be useful for hardened proxy servers. Leave blank for default.
advancedUpdaterDescription: Prompt whenever an update is available.
advancedMigrationsDescription: Extra database migrations that run when Memos is updated. These may address some issues that were not handled by Memos internal migrations.
advancedBackupsDescription: Currently, backups are only run before database migrations.
advancedEnvironmentVariablesDescription:
May be used to configure the WebView.
Format is VARIABLE=VALUE, separated by newlines.
memosOverview: You can leave all fields empty for default values.
memosBinaryPathDescription: Use a specific Memos binary instead of the bundled one.
memosWorkingDirectoryDescription: Path to the Memos working directory.
memosDataDirectoryDescription: Path to the Memos data directory.
memosBindAddressDescription: Binding to 0.0.0.0 will allow access from network and is discouraged.
memosBindPortDescription: The port specified here is preferred, but it will be transparently overridden by Memospot if it is already in use.
memosEnvironmentVariablesDescription:
Environment variables to pass to the Memos binary.
Format is VARIABLE=VALUE, separating variables by newlines.
WARNING: managed variables like MEMOS_MODE will be ignored.
